title: Beyond 2000 Climate in Crisis
brief_description: The Greenhouse Effect is the greatest environmental issue to hit the world this century. Its ultimate consequences could be second only to a nuclear war. Created by the Beyond 2000 group, “Climate in Crisis” comprises six segments. In this special report the phenomenon, the Greenhouse Effect, is examined from a global perspective featuring both British and Australian correspondents. Rated: G
